headline: Booking Holdings to Lay Off Employees, Shift Spending Priorities
summary: Was Booking Holdings getting too fat? With operating costs outpacing revenue growth, something had to give. We might not know the exact chess moves for awhile.

raw.headline: Booking Holdings to Lay Off Employees, Shift Spending Priorities
raw.summary: Was Booking Holdings getting too fat? With operating costs outpacing revenue growth, something had to give. We might not know the exact chess moves for awhile.

headline: Booking Holdings to Cut Jobs
summary: The company, whose brands include Priceline, Kayak and OpenTable, expects to implement organizational changes that include seeking real estate savings, modernizing processes and systems and optimizing procurement.

raw.headline: Booking Holdings to Cut Jobs

headline: Booking.com could cut jobs as part of reorganization plan
summary: The company, a unit of Booking Holdings, said in an emailed statement that it was in the early stages of the review process and no firm decision had been made.  As of the end of 2023, Booking Holdings employed about 23,600 people, according to its annual report, which did not provide figures for Booking.com.  Booking Holdings, in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday, said it expected to provide more details on timing, likely impact on employees and financials from the reorganization "in due course".

raw.headline: Booking.com could cut jobs as part of reorganization plan

As of the end of 2023, Booking Holdings employed about 23,600 people, according to its annual report, which did not provide figures for Booking.com.  Booking Holdings, in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday, said it expected to provide more details on timing, likely impact on employees and financials from the reorganization "in due course".

headline: Booking.com parent to cut jobs as part of reorganization plan
summary: Booking Holdings, which owns brands like Booking.com and Kayak, did not disclose how many jobs would be affected but said it expected to provide more details on timing, likely impact on employees and financials "in due course".  As of the end of 2023, Booking employed about 23,600 people.  Booking Holdings added it would also modernize processes and systems and optimize procurement as part of the organizational changes.

summary: Online travel agency Booking Holdings said on Friday it was planning to implement certain organizational changes, including an expected workforce reduction as part of a bid to cut costs. ...
